parameters.content:
## SEND INTERVIEW EMAIL FLOW

### Purpose: Automatically sends AI interview invitations to qualified candidates

### Who gets invited:
- Completed HireSelect assessment
- Filled out Google Form application
- No Summary yet (not assessed)
- 2+ days since form submission

### What happens:
- Creates personalized AI interview link
- Sends email with interview instructions
- Updates Candidates sheet and AI Interview sheet
- Skips duplicates (checks status column)

nodes.name: Update Sheet - Interview Status1
nodes.notes:
STATUS UPDATE - INTERVIEW

Updates Google Sheet with:
- Status: 'Interview Scheduled'
- AI evaluation score
- Recommendation level
- Interview date

This keeps the ATS current for HR team tracking

assignments.name: welcomeMessage
assignments.value: Hello! Welcome to our interview. I'm excited to learn about your background and discuss this opportunity with you. Let's start with you telling me a bit about yourself and what interests you about this position.

assignments.name: systemPrompt
assignments.value: =You are a professional HR interviewer conducting job interviews. Your goal is to assess candidates thoroughly while making them feel comfortable and valued. Job Description: {{ $json.jobDescription }} Interview Approach: - Start with a warm welcome and brief introduction - Ask about their interest in the role and company - Explore their relevant experience with specific examples - Assess technical skills and cultural fit - Allow time for their questions - Close professionally with next steps Be conversational, ask follow-up questions, and show genuine interest in their responses. If they seem nervous, help them feel at ease. Always maintain a professional yet friendly tone.

parameters.jsCode:
// ========== PASTE YOUR JOB DESCRIPTION HERE ==========
const jobDescription = `
Senior Manager

Job Description:
Lead, mentor, and inspire a distributed team of virtual stylists, image quality specialists, and external production partners.
Build and scale large outsourced teams to ensure productivity, engagement, and adherence to brand standards.
Establish clear performance metrics, accountability frameworks, and operational KPIs to drive excellence.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders—including creative, AI, and brand teams—to align output with business goals.
Oversee end-to-end project workflows for virtual styling and AI image production, from concept to delivery.
Manage projects in Asana or similar tools, ensuring accurate task planning, prioritization, and timeline adherence.
Develop production schedules, capacity plans, and dashboards for real-time operational visibility.
Identify bottlenecks, propose process enhancements, and implement structured project management methodologies.
Manage and strengthen relationships with third-party logistics (3PL) and production vendors to ensure service excellence.
Monitor vendor performance, enforce quality standards, and uphold service-level agreements (SLAs).
Develop frameworks for evaluating vendor efficiency, communication, and scalability.
Lead vendor onboarding, training, and continuous improvement initiatives.
Define and enforce high standards for image quality, styling accuracy, and brand consistency.
Oversee systematic quality control processes and resolve discrepancies with internal and external teams.
Collaborate with AI and creative teams to refine virtual styling models and enhance rendering accuracy.
Use data-driven insights to evolve quality benchmarks and improve operational performance.
Champion the integration of emerging tools, automation, and AI technologies to streamline production workflows.
Stay informed of industry trends in virtual styling, digital fashion, and AI-generated imagery.
Develop and maintain playbooks, standard operating procedures (SOPs), and training materials to ensure consistency across all teams and partners.

Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Fashion Design, Merchandising, Visual Arts, Operations Management, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
5+ years of experience in digital fashion, creative operations, or e-commerce production — with proven experience managing outsourced or offshore teams.
Strong proficiency in Asana (or similar project management platforms such as Airtable or Monday.com) for team coordination, task tracking, and workflow automation.
Demonstrated success in leading cross-functional teams and managing large-scale, fast-paced creative projects.
Experience overseeing 3PL operations or external vendor management in a creative production or digital content environment.
Deep understanding of digital image quality standards, styling principles, and fashion aesthetics.
Excellent leadership, organizational, and interpersonal communication skills.
Ability to balance creative excellence with operational efficiency and data-driven decision-making.
`;

// KEEP ALL DATA and add job description
return $input.all().map(item => {
  return {
    json: {
      ...item.json,
      jobDescription: jobDescription.trim(),
      // EXPLICITLY PASS EMAIL AND NAME
      _email: item.json['Email'] || item.json['Email Address'],
      _name: item.json['First Name'] || item.json['Full Name'] || 'Candidate'
    }
  };
});

nodes.name: IF - Check Google&HS Status1
nodes.notes:
DECISION POINT

Routes candidates based on evaluation:

TRUE (Score = 70):
- Send interview invitation
- Schedule meeting
- Update status to 'Interview Scheduled'

FALSE (Score < 70):
- Send rejection email
- Update status to 'Rejected'
- Archive application
